description: A manuscript copy of a manuscript original. Shows area on the north side of Staten Island adjoining Kill Van Kull. Pen-and-ink on tracing linen, mounted on cloth. Oriented with norh toward the lower left. Includes notes. In pen and ink on octagonal blue bordered label in lower right corner: 851 n 53 1823. Transferred from the USCGS January 15, 1914. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.

description: This record covers single maps of Hawaii, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. This collection includes single printed maps, photocopies of single maps as well as multi-sheet single maps, and plates from atlases, books and periodicals. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/. Title supplied by cataloger. If a map in this collection may be in copyright, there is no online image available. LC Trails, 5, 24, 77, 139, 140, 141, 253 Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Most maps in English. Some maps in French. Drawers 1-3.

medium: 3 drawers of maps : some color, some hand colored, some photocopies ; various sizes.

description: This record covers single maps of Hawaii as a whole covering various subjects, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. This collection includes single printed maps and photocopies of printed or manuscript single maps and may also include some multi-sheet single maps, plates from atlases, books or periodicals, and printed facsimiles. These maps show various subjects, such as topography and other physical characteristics, public lands and land use, mines and minerals, geology, hydrology, administrative and political divisions, and recreation and tourism. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/. Title supplied by cataloger. If a map in this collection may be in copyright, there is no online image available. LC Trails, 261 Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Drawers 4-8, 10.

medium: 6 drawers of maps : some color, some photocopies ; various sizes.
notes: This record covers single maps of Hawaii as a whole covering various subjects, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. These maps show various subjects, such as topography and other physical characteristics, public lands and land use, mines and minerals, geology, hydrology, administrative and political divisions, and recreation and tourism. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/.
